articles.title: Covid-19: SA does not have the B.1.617 variant which is prevalent in India - Zweli Mkhize - News24
articles.description: The B.1.617 variant of the virus that causes Covid-19, which is prevalent in India, has not been detected in South Africa, says Health Minister Zweli Mkhize, and measures have been put in place to prevent it from entering the country.
